trans-unit.target: Point in Time Restore, Microsoft Azure SQL Database, restore database, recover database, REST API

trans-unit.target: Restore an Azure SQL database using Point in Time Restore with REST API

trans-unit.target: [AZURE.SELECTOR]

trans-unit.source: Point in Time Restore - portal
trans-unit.target: Point in Time Restore - portal

trans-unit.source: Point in Time Restore - PowerShell
trans-unit.target: Point in Time Restore - PowerShell

trans-unit.source: Overview
trans-unit.target: Overview

trans-unit.source: This guide shows you how to restore an Azure SQL database using Point in Time Restore with REST API.
trans-unit.target: This guide shows you how to restore an Azure SQL database using Point in Time Restore with REST API.

trans-unit.source: Links to more detailed operations are provided.
trans-unit.target: Links to more detailed operations are provided.

trans-unit.source: Point in Time Restore creates a new database.
trans-unit.target: Point in Time Restore creates a new database.

trans-unit.source: The service automatically selects the service tier based on the backup used at the restore point.
trans-unit.target: The service automatically selects the service tier based on the backup used at the restore point.

trans-unit.source: Make sure you have available quota on the logical server to create another database.
trans-unit.target: Make sure you have available quota on the logical server to create another database.

trans-unit.source: If you'd like to request an increased quota, contact [Azure Support](http://azure.microsoft.com/support/options/).
trans-unit.target: If you'd like to request an increased quota, contact [Azure Support](http://azure.microsoft.com/support/options/).

trans-unit.source: Restrictions and Security
trans-unit.target: Restrictions and Security

trans-unit.source: See [Restore an Azure SQL database using Point in Time Restore in the Azure portal](sql-database-point-in-time-restore-tutorial-management-portal.md).
trans-unit.target: See [Restore an Azure SQL database using Point in Time Restore in the Azure portal](sql-database-point-in-time-restore-tutorial-management-portal.md).

trans-unit.source: How to: Restore an Azure SQL database using REST API
trans-unit.target: How to: Restore an Azure SQL database using REST API

trans-unit.source: Get the database you want to restore using the [Get Database](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn505708.aspx) operation.
trans-unit.target: Get the database you want to restore using the [Get Database](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn505708.aspx) operation.

trans-unit.source: Create the restore request using the [Create Database Restore Request](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn509571.aspx) operation.
trans-unit.target: Create the restore request using the [Create Database Restore Request](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn509571.aspx) operation.

trans-unit.source: Track the restore request using the [Database Operation Status](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn720371.aspx) operation.
trans-unit.target: Track the restore request using the [Database Operation Status](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn720371.aspx) operation.
